text: Damon G. Tunnicliff (August 20, 1829 - December 20, 1901) was an American jurist. Born in Herkimer County, New York, Tunnicliff practiced law in Macomb, Illinois. From February to June 1888, Tunnicliff served briefly on the Illinois Supreme Court. Tunnicliff died in Macomb, Illinois.Illinois Supreme Court-Damon G. Tunnicliff'The Green Bag,' 1891, volume III, edited by Horace W. Fuller, The Boston Book Company: 1891, pg. 236 ==Notes== Category:1829 births Category:1901 deaths Category:People from Herkimer County, New York Category:People from Macomb, Illinois Category:Justices of the Illinois Supreme Court
title: Damon G. Tunnicliff
